prefix.name: Prefix
prefix.description:
Set the appearance of an incoming chat message.
Use §6%message%§f as the placeholder for messages.
Use §6%user%§f as the placeholder for the username.

controlPanel.name: StreamChat+ Control Tab
controlPanel.description:
Adds a Control Tab at the top.
§cThis feature requires a restart.

name.label: Name
name.invalid_empty: The name may not be empty!
name.invalid_characters: The name may only contain letters (a-z and A-Z)!

trigger.label: Trigger(s)
trigger.invalid_exists: One of the triggers already exists!
trigger.invalid_characters: The trigger may only contain letters (a-z and A-Z)!

response.label: Response
response.invalid_characters: Response may not only contain whitespaces!

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name of the command so that you can identify it.

triggers.title: Trigger
triggers.description: One or multiple key words that cause the bot to send the response. Triggers can only be letters and may not contain special characters, so you don't have to add a prefix. If you want to have multiple triggers for one command separate them by a comma.

response.title: Response
response.description: What the Bot should reply back when the command is executed. You may use §6%variables%§r in your response. A list of variables can be found below.

variable.title: Variables
variable.description: Variables are placeholders that will be replaced with a value when the command is executed.
